resources.string:
Final Jumper is game that resembles DoodleJump where the object is to jump from platform to platform.

Character movement is controlled by the accelerometer (tilting your phone left/right). For demo and testing purposes, the A and D keys may also be used for left and right movement.

The higher you jump, the higher the score. Good luck and Have Fun!!

Developers:
Brad Wilcox and Michael Cha
